S wanted me to read Pinocchio out to her this afternoon. Later this night, right after she brushed her teeth, she innocently asked me if ‘wishing stars’ were true. I of course, confirmed they did exist and that she had to patiently wait for the magic to come through. Now girl, not everything you read in books is true!

Not sure how long she’ll actually believe these things but I do hope to keep this awesome concept of magic alive in her as much as I can. ðŸ”—
